page.title: 15BRADFIELD-HUNGERFORD LANE.
page.content: Hungerford lane is on the Bradfield and Bucklebury parish border. Bradfield South End post office is a sorting for the Reading area, it is also a small store selling wines including local wines,sweets and greeting cards. Boot Farm is now an equestrian centre with thirty horses. The farm grows maize,hay and makes silage.There is a herd of a hundred milking cows. Cripps Farm has mainly store cattle. Acres Farm builings have been converted into a craft centre making iron and brass grates, fenders and decorative iron fences and gates.There is a nursery with glass houses specialising in trees and hardy stock. The Thames valley water Authority have a small covered reservoir and pumping station.Housing is all private with people commuting to work in Reading or Newbury.
